entries.summary: Major enhancement sprint: Complete website transformation with game integration, blog overhaul, and UI polish.
items: Phase 1: Game Assets Integration - Authentic p(Doom)1 visual identity with comprehensive game-integration.css (847 lines)
Phase 2: Developer Blog Revolution - Complete blog redesign with professional content, filtering, and statistics
Phase 3: UI Polish & Navigation Enhancement - Enhanced footer, breadcrumb navigation, quick actions menu, keyboard shortcuts
Created featured technical blog post: 'Architecture Revolution: From Monolith to Modular Excellence'
Implemented comprehensive keyboard navigation (Q for quick actions, Ctrl+H/F/R/C for sections, 1-6 for menu items)
Added professional 4-column footer with organized quick links and status indicators
Established proper development processes with semantic versioning and blog entry workflow
Enhanced mobile responsiveness and accessibility with proper ARIA labels
Integrated ui-enhancements.css framework (575 lines) for consistent navigation components
Added interactive stats with clickable elements linking to dedicated stats page
Relocated stats page to /game-stats/ to avoid authentication conflicts
Enhanced main page with improved click areas for roadmap cards
Added prominent Download Now buttons for better conversion
Improved visual feedback on hover interactions
